memory.last_client_text: Sorry—are we discussing the trip? What details do you need from me?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Hi! I’m looking to plan a trip in March with 2 adults. I’m a bit confused between places—can you shortlist options?

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: Budget.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Sorry—are we discussing the trip? What details do you need from me?

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: What is your budget?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Budget is around ₹2.0L–₹3.5L total, ideally including flights + hotels.

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: Okay. And when are you planning to travel, and how many nights will you be staying?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: We’re 2 adults. March—probably mid-March (flexible by a few days), but we can shift a bit if it helps. 6–8 nights (not fixed).

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: And what kind of activities do you like to do on vacations?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Mostly sightseeing, plus one light activity like a short hike or a park—no scuba.

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: I recommend Manali.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Manali in India sounds interesting—It could work in our budget. And how is it in March?

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: March is great for travel as it is spring.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Manali in India sounds interesting—It could work in our budget.

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: I can share the itinerary and hotels I've planned.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Yes—please share a simple day-wise itinerary for Manali, best areas to stay (family-friendly), and what’s included (hotel, breakfast, transfers, sightseeing).

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: Okay. Should I text you the itinerary plan we have?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I’d prefer to keep it on chat for now—can you share the itinerary + inclusions here?

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: I recommend hikes and rafting.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Hikes And Rafting sounds interesting—It could work in our budget.

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: Is it a fit?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Nice—can you share a simple day-wise itinerary for Hikes And Rafting, best areas to stay, and what’s included?

transcript.speaker: salesperson
transcript.text: Sure. But I don't have it right now. I can share it because it is in file.

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: Sorry—are we discussing the trip? What details do you need from me?

evidence: Okay. And when are you planning to travel, and how many nights will you be staying?
And what kind of activities do you like to do on vacations?
Okay. Should I text you the itinerary plan we have?
strengths: You kept the conversation interactive with questions.
improvements: Improve discovery: Asked departure city / origin, Asked pace/preferences.
